title: Table Tennis v2.2.0420.2 and data
description:
If you like table tennis, you'll love Table Tennis Touch. Stunning graphics, intuitive swipe controls, realistic high speed gameplay and multiple game modes have made Table Tennis Touch the world's #1 table tennis game.

â€¢ CAREER - rise through the ranks in a packed career mode featuring tournaments, leagues and special events.
â€¢ MINI GAME FUN - 13 unique ping pong challenges including Half Table, Skittles and Accuracy Zones.
â€¢ MULTIPLAYER - challenge friends in both local and online real-time multiplayer.
â€¢ CUSTOMISE - bats to unlock and customise with over 30 bat designs.
â€¢ REALISM - stunning arenas, realistic physics and sophisticated AI.

What are you waiting for? Go hit some balls!

FEEDBACK OR QUESTIONS?
We'd love to hear from you so drop us a line at email supportor check out the FAQs

Whatâ€™s new:
Big news - Update #9 for Table Tennis Touch brings you language support!
Now choose to play in either French, German, Italian, Spanish, Russian, Turkish, Brazilian Portuguese, Japanese or Korean. Lovely stuff.
But that's not all...we've also added more bat skins, added game selection back into Quick Game, made lots of changes to improve your experience and squished some bugs.
Thanks everyone for your support and keep the feedback coming!

Requirements: Android OS 4.1 and up
Install APK. Place data folder in SDCard/Android/Obb/ and play
